definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.chinese: 测量体温是对小儿烦扰，会使小儿不安。

sentences.english: The temperature of cold-blooded animals change with the temperature of the surroundings .
sentences.chinese: 冷血动物的体温随着周围的环境的改变而变化。

sentences.english: Continue to hold the thermometer in place while taking his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 量体温的过程中要一直拿住体温计。

sentences.english: Continue to hold the thermometer in place while taking his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 量体温的过程中要一直拿住体温计。

sentences.english: Anesthetics alter thermoregulatory responses in all patients.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉改变病人的体温调节反应。

sentences.english: Please put the thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 请把体温表夹在你的腋下。

sentences.english: During this time your body temperature is still low, but your blood pressure is sharply rising.
sentences.chinese: 这段时间里你的体温偏低，但血压骤什。

sentences.english: The spokesman says his temperature is normal and that his mental health is fine.
sentences.chinese: 毛说他的体温正常并且精神状态良好。

sentences.english: People arriving in China also have their temperatures checked.
sentences.chinese: 到了中国的人员都要做体温检查。

sentences.english: First I need to take your temperature.
Open your mouth, dear. We're going to take your temperature.
sentences.chinese: 张开嘴，亲爱的，我帮你量一量体温。

sentences.english: Her temperature came down in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上她的体温就降下来了。

sentences.english: He was conscious, slightly hypothermic and appeared to have some frostbite.
sentences.chinese: 他很清醒，略有体温过低的状况，好像还有些冻伤。

sentences.english: An afebrile elderly woman who suffered from left flank pain for 1 month visited the emergency department for help.
sentences.chinese: 一位体温正常老妇人因左腰痛一个月到急诊部门求医。

sentences.english: The nurse used a thermometer in order that she might take his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 护士使用体温表来量他的体温。

sentences.english: The nurse used a thermometer in order that she might take his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 护士使用体温表来量他的体温。

definition: to have a high temperature/feverish/unable to think calmly/to emit heat
antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
to have a high temperature (from illness)/to have a fever
